dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Inhabits clear running water, without a strong current to a depth of 3 meters during dry season.  Prefers narrow cracks of submerged rocks, small passages between superimposed rocks, or lives below flat rocks on the bottom.

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
